title: I have a Case # filed by Rogers with Google for my Pixel 4 XL, Where do I go to see this through.
content:
My Phone stopped charging in less then a year after purchase, my device protection, Rogers and now Google are not helping me get it fixed.  I was told that I would be sent a replacement phone which was not done. Rogers has now said they will not help me and has forwarded me to Google with a case # but I  can not get ahold of them in any way. 

Where do I go? Who do I talk too? I have been trying to get this fixed for three months.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
